rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The World Health Organization (WHO) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) have said that there has been an increase in outbreaks among mammals caused by influenza viruses, including avian influenza A (H5).

rationale: The segment uses factual language ('increase in outbreaks') without high-potency verbs, metaphors, or intensified harm nouns.
statement_text: The World Health Organization (WHO) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) have said that there has been an increase in outbreaks among mammals caused by influenza viruses, including avian influenza A (H5).
